mdRecord.dcterms:title: Rand McNally Official 1922 auto trails map, District no. 20
Official 1922 auto trails map, District 20
Rand McNally Official auto trails map, District no. 20
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Rand McNally and Company.
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 62 x 79 cm. folded into cover 18 x 10 cm. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Covers: Southern Ohio, West Virginia, Virginia, Southern Maryland, Southern Delaware, North Carolina, Northern South Carolina, Northern Georga, E. Tennessee, E. Kentucky.
Information on trail markings and individual state highway markers at bottom of sheet.
Folded into original printed covers that feature an advertisement for Bedford Motor Company on front.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Gift of Howard E. Johnston.
